entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text:
@narendramodi Respected Mr.Modi,
Presently the entire nation is suffering due to the Coronavirus pandemic and there is a Sound of a Disaster yet to come with folded hands,We Sincerely Request you to save India and its people by praying & requesting Saint Rampal ji maharaj to end this pandemic.
